channel.title: First few sigs
channel.description:
Well I just started,tried before and got bored and now tried again..Would love lots of cc and rate please :)
Followed some tutorials for some of these,and some were just randomly made...
[IMG]http://i143.photobucket.com/albums/r144/madoushi21/tutbginprogresscopy.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i143.photobucket.com/albums/r144/madoushi21/Techsiginprogresscopy.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i143.photobucket.com/albums/r144/madoushi21/goodsigforoncecopy.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i143.photobucket.com/albums/r144/madoushi21/Userbar-frost21copy.gif[/img]

item.title: First few sigs
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

[quote=“frost21, post:11, topic:123616”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=173408.msg1602001#msg1602001 date=1184626214]

Still you couldve said it friendlier.

You can deal with it, or you can cry about it.
[/quote]

Haha thanks for the constructive criticisim,killer…he wasnt being mean.

I tried to make the sprite fit in, making it look like he shot the big blast :}[/quote]

No prob

Read full topic

You can deal with it, or you can cry about it.[/quote]

Haha thanks for the constructive criticisim legit, and killer…he wasnt being mean.

I tried to make the sprite fit in, making it look like he shot the big blast :}

item.title: First few sigs
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:5, topic:123616”]Sure, I really don’t want to rate, but I’ll tell you what I dislike about the sigs.

The first one has a nice effect, though it is mostly empty space on the right side.

The Halo 2 one uses a render from the first promo image, which is used everywhere. The background really has nothing to do with the render… it seems out of place.

The spiderman one looks nice because the red and blue splotches flow into spiderman.

The userbar is too high for its width, the text is too big, and the sprite really seems out of place.[/quote]

Man he just started, dont be mean man!

Read full topic

item.title: First few sigs
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Sure, I really don’t want to rate, but I’ll tell you what I dislike about the sigs.

The first one has a nice effect, though it is mostly empty space on the right side.

The Halo 2 one uses a render from the first promo image, which is used everywhere. The background really has nothing to do with the render… it seems out of place.

The spiderman one looks nice because the red and blue splotches flow into spiderman.

The userbar is too high for its width, the text is too big, and the sprite really seems out of place.

Read full topic

item.title: First few sigs
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:3, topic:123616”][quote author=zammyking111 link=topic=173408.msg1600076#msg1600076 date=1184563705]
the halo one and the last one are good
[/quote]

I’d have to go against that. The userbar is slightly trite, and the halo one is simply a shaded render on a background. I like the first and third.[/quote]

Thanks,but can you tell me what I can improve on…and rate please guys…

Yes the halo one is junk,really was outta ideas and couldnt find any tutorials that didnt seem impossibile for me.

Read full topic
